summary: The video tells the story of Michael Harding, a young Australian veteran, and his partner Bek Houghton. It explores Michael's experiences with PTSD after his deployment to Afghanistan, Bek's dedication in finding alternative treatments, and their discovery of the benefits of flotation therapy. The narrative culminates with the creation of their organization, 'Weeded Warrior', advocating for veteran support through alternative therapies.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a white screen that transitions to a logo reading "FLOAT CONFERENCE PORTLAND 2016" in black and blue text. The scene then shifts to a stage with a blue-lit background, featuring two large white objects resembling oversized computer mice, stacks of bottled water, and a small tent-like structure. Two individuals, Bek Houghton and Michael Harding, are seen on stage, with Bek wearing a dark blue patterned top and Michael in a gray t-shirt with a "Retro Warrior" logo. They stand behind a podium, with a large screen displaying their names. The screen then changes to show the title "Floatation for Service-Induced Stress: A Veteran's Story" along with the "Retro Warrior" logo and a dedication to Lance Corporal Lance Leedham. The video continues with Bek and Michael standing behind the podium, with Bek speaking and Michael gesturing with his hands. The background features a geometric patterned wall and a large white object with a circular design. The video concludes with Bek and Michael still on stage, with Bek speaking and Michael gesturing, maintaining the same background and podium setup.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with rhythmic percussion instruments, creating an energetic, almost upbeat, mood with an underlying bluesy rock vibe. Then, a male speaker, in a positive and relaxed tone, shares reflective quotes about the process of learning and sharing wisdom. He attributes one quote to Galileo and another to Deepak Chopra. He then transitions to introducing the theme of their journey with flotation for stress management. At one point, the speaker jokes with the audience, questioning what their accents might be or what listeners are thinking. He finishes the first section by inviting the audience to stay present.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a presentation by two individuals, a woman and a man, standing behind a podium with a geometric design. The woman, wearing glasses and a dark top, and the man, sporting a graphic t-shirt and jeans, engage with the audience, with the man gesturing as he speaks. The background is a white wall with a geometric pattern, and a blue-lit area is visible to the right. The scene transitions to a large screen displaying a photograph of a group of soldiers in military uniforms, captioned "Afghanistan 2010 - Mentoring Task Force 1." The photograph shows soldiers posing in front of a military vehicle, with some standing on top of it. The video then presents a collage of four images under the same caption, depicting various scenes: a mountainous landscape, soldiers in combat gear, two soldiers sitting on a road, and a sunset over a body of water. The atmosphere throughout the video is formal and informative, with a focus on the military theme and the presentation of visual content related to the mentoring task force in Afghanistan.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features a single male speaker, beginning with a formal introduction, stating, "I'm Michael, and this is my partner, Beck." He then narrates his personal experiences starting in 2010, detailing his deployment to Afghanistan as an infantry section machine gunner. The speaker describes his initial impressions of Afghanistan, mentioning "sweeping valleys, snow-capped mountains," and children approaching with smiles. His speaking tone is conversational, transitioning to descriptive as he recalls his experiences.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a collage of images depicting soldiers in Afghanistan in 2010, showcasing various scenes such as mountainous landscapes, soldiers in combat gear, and a sunset over a mountainous region. The scene transitions to a stage presentation where two individuals stand in front of a large screen displaying the same collage of images. The stage is set with various objects, including large white objects resembling computer mice and stacks of bottled water. The background is illuminated with blue lighting, creating a dramatic atmosphere. The presentation continues with the screen displaying a new set of images, including a family photo with the text "From fit and healthy in 2009... to Zombie-fried in 2011," indicating a humorous or satirical commentary on the passage of time and changes in appearance. The video concludes with a close-up of the family photo, emphasizing the contrast between the two images and the accompanying text.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker reflecting on his wartime experiences, remarking that "the reality of war is that it's not all postcards" and recounting a specific incident where his section 2IC was killed. His tone is somber as he details returning to Australia and suffering from full-body involuntary muscular twitches. He describes the difficulties he faced, such as spilling water and food on himself and struggling to light a cigarette.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a comparison of two photographs, highlighting a transformation over time. The first photo, labeled "From fit and healthy in 2009," shows a man in military uniform and a woman in casual attire, both smiling and posing together. The second photo, captioned "...to Zombie-fried in 2011," depicts the same couple, now dressed more formally, with the man in a suit and the woman in a floral dress, standing outdoors with trees in the background. The scene then transitions to a man with long hair, wearing a gray t-shirt with the text "Weed Warrior" and a graphic of a cannabis leaf, speaking against a blue background. The man appears to be giving a presentation or speech, as indicated by his posture and the presence of a microphone clipped to his shirt. The video maintains a consistent focus on the speaker, with no significant changes in the background or his attire throughout the sequence.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single male speaker discussing conventional treatments that "numbed" him and caused weight gain and withdrawal from social life, including declining Christmas and birthday parties, leading to him retreating into a shell. The speaker's tone is reflective and somber.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with long, curly hair wearing a gray t-shirt with the words "Weed Warrior" printed on it, standing against a blue background. He appears to be speaking, as indicated by his mouth movements and the presence of a microphone clipped to his shirt. The scene transitions to a stage where the same man is standing next to a woman with glasses and a ponytail, both positioned behind a podium. A large screen behind them displays two photographs with captions: "From fit and healthy in 2009" and "...to Zombie-Fried in 2011," suggesting a narrative of transformation or change over time. The stage is illuminated with blue lighting, and the background features a geometric pattern. The man and woman seem to be presenting or discussing the content displayed on the screen.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio features one male speaker, sharing his personal experiences with a somber tone. He details being put on medications, turning to alcohol to numb feelings, and the medication's side effects, specifically the inability to cry. He mentions feeling suicidal and homicidal. No music or background sounds are present.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman and a man standing behind a podium on a stage, with the woman wearing glasses and a blue patterned top, and the man sporting a grey t-shirt with a graphic design, tattoos, and jeans. They appear to be presenting or speaking, with the woman gesturing as she speaks. The background is a geometric patterned wall with a blue hue, and the stage is lit with blue lighting. A large screen displays a photo of a couple with the text "From fit and healthy in 2009... to Zombie-fried in 2011," indicating a humorous or light-hearted theme. The stage also features oversized computer mice and stacks of what appear to be batteries or similar objects. The atmosphere is professional yet casual, with the presenters engaging with the audience. The video transitions between close-ups of the presenters and wider shots of the stage, emphasizing their interaction and the visual elements of the presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker who mentions "the support of my partner Beck", that he used it "to move on to a path of healing, using alternative therapies", and offers her a chance to speak. The female speaker then discusses that the journey "has had so many ups and downs" and that caring for someone with PTSD takes "a heavy toll on even a healthy person". She describes this as "the ripple effect", and mentions having been depressed, lonely, isolated, and suffering from debilitating back pain that left her bedridden, making it difficult for her to care for "Michael". She then shares that her "only priority" was to care for Michael and her own stuff "wasn't even an issue", and mentions doctors saying Michael would be on psychotropic medication for the rest of his life.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with glasses and a ponytail, wearing a blue patterned top, standing behind a podium with a blue and brown design, speaking to an audience. Beside her stands a man with long hair, wearing a gray t-shirt with a graphic design and blue jeans, holding a microphone. The background is a geometric patterned wall with blue lighting. The woman gestures with her hands while speaking, and the man listens attentively. The scene transitions to a close-up of the woman, who continues to speak, with the man partially visible beside her. The video then shows a Google search page with the query 'Alternative treatments for post traumatic stress' typed in, followed by a close-up of the woman looking at a laptop screen. The scene shifts back to the stage, where the woman and man are now standing in front of a large screen displaying a slide titled 'Journey to Wellness,' listing various wellness topics such as nutrition, yoga, and meditation. The stage is decorated with large white objects resembling oversized computer mice and stacks of bottled water. The video concludes with a close-up of the slide, highlighting the wellness topics and an image of two people embracing.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker describing how standard treatment was making someone worse, leading her to search for "real solutions," turning to Google for guidance. She explains getting "lost down that rabbit hole" for a year, researching, contacting academics, and finding acceptance for alternative treatments in coalition countries. She continues describing how Google introduced her to a new world of healthcare, including "food is medicine," "cannabis as medicine," and other health practices. She mentions Joe Rogan, transitioning to a sound that suggests laughter.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman and a man standing on a stage with a geometric-patterned backdrop. The woman, wearing glasses and a dark top, is positioned behind a podium with a blue and brown design, while the man, sporting a gray t-shirt with a graphic design and blue jeans, stands beside her holding a microphone. The atmosphere suggests a formal presentation or discussion, with the woman appearing to speak or prepare to speak, as indicated by her hand gestures and facial expressions. The man seems to be listening attentively, occasionally glancing at the woman. The stage is well-lit, highlighting the speakers and the podium, while the background remains consistent throughout the video, maintaining a professional and focused setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a female speaker, sharing that "the benefits were profound." She then mentions that "it took me six months to convince Michael to get in a tank." Her tone is casual and conversational. There are no other distinguishable sounds present.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with glasses and a ponytail, wearing a blue patterned top, standing behind a podium with a blue and brown design. She is speaking and gesturing with her hands, while a man with tattoos on his arms, wearing a gray t-shirt and jeans, stands beside her holding a microphone. The background is a geometric patterned wall with a blue hue, and the atmosphere suggests a formal presentation or conference setting. The woman appears engaged and expressive, occasionally looking to her side, possibly addressing someone off-camera or referring to notes. The man remains mostly stationary, attentively listening to her. The lighting is bright, highlighting the speakers and the podium, creating a professional and focused environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a female speaker discussing personal health and well-being. She emphasizes taking responsibility and suggests they would be in a very dire situation if they had only followed doctors' orders, implying her partner "would have taken his life by now." Her tone is thoughtful and serious. She then transitions to finding multiple modalities that resonate, adding they've found cannabis and flotation to be the most symbiotic. The speaker then welcomes her partner to explain flotation, and it ends with that.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a presentation on "Floatation for Service-Induced Stress," with a focus on embracing personal health and wellness, combining modalities, and using floatation for trauma management. The presenter, a man with long hair and a gray t-shirt, stands at a podium with a woman beside him, both engaged in the discussion. The background is a blue-lit stage with a large screen displaying the presentation's title and bullet points, along with an image of a person floating in a tank. The atmosphere is professional and informative, with the presenter gesturing and speaking to the audience. The video transitions to a close-up of the presenter, highlighting his facial expressions and body language as he elaborates on the topic. The woman, wearing glasses and a dark top, listens attentively and occasionally interacts with the presenter. The setting includes a geometric-patterned wall and a blue-lit backdrop, creating a modern and focused environment. The video concludes with the presenter and the woman standing together at the podium, emphasizing the collaborative nature of the presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with an acknowledgment, followed by a male speaker who discusses alternative treatments and the benefits of flotation. He attributes this to helping him to regain quality of life, particularly in addressing sleep-related issues like insomnia, night sweats, and night terrors. He shares that it gave him much needed rest and allowed him to come back to life.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with long hair and a gray t-shirt standing on a stage with a blue background, speaking into a microphone. He is accompanied by a woman with glasses and a dark top, who is standing behind a podium. The stage is decorated with large white objects resembling oversized computer mice and stacks of bottled water. A large screen displays a presentation slide titled "Enlightenment for Service Induced Stress," which includes bullet points about personal responsibility, combining abilities, and enlightenment for team management. The atmosphere is professional, with the man actively engaging with the audience, while the woman appears to be listening attentively. The video captures the man's expressions and gestures as he speaks, emphasizing his points with hand movements and facial expressions. The setting suggests a conference or seminar focused on personal and team development.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single male speaker, who describes floating as having helped him reconnect with his emotions, after a period of numbness. He speaks of relearning how to be happy, confident, and how to love again, emotions that were lost to him. He adds that with the help of cannabis, he has been able to reprocess traumas experienced in Afghanistan, view them in a more positive light, and mitigate the triggers associated with memories and anniversaries. Throughout the speech, there is the presence of consistent background ambience, creating a neutral auditory background.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman standing at a podium, presenting a slide titled "Floatation for Services Induced Stress," which includes bullet points about embracing responsibility for personal health and wellness, combining modalities, and floatation for trauma management. The slide features an image of a person floating in a tank. The scene transitions to a white screen displaying the logo "Weeded Warrior" along with contact information, including a website, Facebook page, and email addresses. The video then shows a man and a woman standing at a podium, with the man wearing a gray t-shirt with a graphic design and jeans, and the woman in a dark top. The background features a geometric pattern and blue lighting. The man speaks, and the camera focuses on him, showing his facial expressions and gestures. The video concludes with a shot of the audience, who are clapping and appear engaged, indicating a positive reception to the presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker introducing "weeded warrior," an Australian organization. He expresses active advocacy for modalities, including yoga, floatation, nutrition, and cannabis, aiming to educate not just veterans, but the broader service community. He urges owners and starters of float tank centers to consider investing in veterans, inviting them and providing the experience of immeasurable benefit. The speaker concludes by expressing gratitude for the opportunity and thanking the audience. The speech is punctuated by cheering and applause at the end. This transitions into a brief musical interlude featuring a meditative instrumental piece, possibly for relaxation or reflection.
